name: onepassword
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing onepassword resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`onepassword` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/1Password/terraform-provider-onepassword).

token.description: A valid token for your 1Password Connect API. Can also be sourced from OP_CONNECT_TOKEN.

url.description:
The HTTP(S) URL where your 1Password Connect API can be found. Must be provided through the the OP_CONNECT_HOST
environment variable if this attribute is not set.

type.description: (Only applies to the database category) The type of database. One of ["db2" "filemaker" "msaccess" "mssql" "mysql" "oracle" "postgresql" "sqlite" "other"]

digits.description: Use digits [0-9] when generating the password.

length.description: The length of the password to be generated.

letters.description: Use letters [a-zA-Z] when generating the password.

symbols.description: Use symbols [!@.-_*] when generating the password.

fields.description: A list of custom fields in the section.

id.description: A unique identifier for the section.

type.description: (Only applies to the database category) The type of database. One of ["db2" "filemaker" "msaccess" "mssql" "mysql" "oracle" "postgresql" "sqlite" "other"]

digits.description: Use digits [0-9] when generating the password.

length.description: The length of the password to be generated.

letters.description: Use letters [a-zA-Z] when generating the password.

symbols.description: Use symbols [!@.-_*] when generating the password.

provider.description:
The provider type for the onepassword package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

token.description: A valid token for your 1Password Connect API. Can also be sourced from OP_CONNECT_TOKEN.

url.description:
The HTTP(S) URL where your 1Password Connect API can be found. Must be provided through the the OP_CONNECT_HOST
environment variable if this attribute is not set.

token.description: A valid token for your 1Password Connect API. Can also be sourced from OP_CONNECT_TOKEN.

The HTTP(S) URL where your 1Password Connect API can be found. Must be provided through the the OP_CONNECT_HOST
environment variable if this attribute is not set.

category.description: The category of the item. One of ["login" "password" "database"]

database.description: (Only applies to the database category) The name of the database.

hostname.description: (Only applies to the database category) The address where the database can be found

port.description: (Only applies to the database category) The port the database is listening on.

sections.description: A list of custom sections in an item

tags.description: An array of strings of the tags assigned to the item.

type.description: (Only applies to the database category) The type of database. One of ["db2" "filemaker" "msaccess" "mssql" "mysql" "oracle" "postgresql" "sqlite" "other"]

url.description: The primary URL for the item.

uuid.description: The UUID of the item. Item identifiers are unique within a specific vault.

vault.description: The UUID of the vault the item is in.

title.description: The title of the item to retrieve. This field will be populated with the title of the item if the item it looked up by its UUID.

uuid.description: The UUID of the item to retrieve. This field will be populated with the UUID of the item if the item it looked up by its title.

onepassword:index/getVault:GetVault.description: Use this data source to get details of a vault by either its name or uuid.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking GetVault.

name.description: The name of the vault to retrieve. This field will be populated with the name of the vault if the vault it looked up by its UUID.

uuid.description: The UUID of the vault to retrieve. This field will be populated with the UUID of the vault if the vault it looked up by its name.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by GetVault.

name.description: The name of the vault to retrieve. This field will be populated with the name of the vault if the vault it looked up by its UUID.

uuid.description: The UUID of the vault to retrieve. This field will be populated with the UUID of the vault if the vault it looked up by its name.

> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/1Password/terraform-provider-onepassword)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi/pulumi-onepassword` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-onepassword/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`1Password/terraform-provider-onepassword` repo](https://github.com/1Password/terraform-provider-onepassword/issues).
